name: CROM
description:
CROM. CROM doesn't think much.

CROM has a dog. Dog is good dog. Dog is CROM dog.

CROM will destroy dungeon.

CROM will destroy dungeon ... whatever the cost ?

Might currently crash or not be displayed correctly on resolutions or screens above 1920x1080. Working on that. CROM doesn't like too many pixels.

Recommended resolution is 1920x1080.

Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 43 :

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/crom
